thread.title: U.K. Labour Economy Spokesman John McDonnell Seeks BOE Mandate Review
thread.title_full: U.K. Labour Economy Spokesman John McDonnell Seeks BOE Mandate Review - WSJ

author: Jason Douglas
title: U.K. Labour Economy Spokesman John McDonnell Seeks BOE Mandate Review
text:
LONDON—The new economy spokesman for the U.K.’s main opposition Labour Party on Monday called for a review of the Bank of England’s mandate, saying lawmakers should consider whether the central bank should have a broader role in the economy than keeping inflation in check.
Parliament should debate whether the BOE’s goals should be broadened to include targets for economic prosperity and investment, John McDonnell told the British...
